content: @Sssss Sssss If you have a question that's unrelated to the current stream thread, make sure you change the stream topic when you post - otherwise your post appears in the middle of an unrelated thread. I don't really understand your question about "I want to give this patient reference for observation" - do you mean you want to search for observations with that patient id? If so, it would just be Observation?patient=12345. In terms of your second question, look at the $everything operation define on Patient. (The operations and profiles tab)
